name: webcenterjs
description: A Framework Independent Javascript Library that makes working with Oracle WebCenter REST API a breeze.

scripts.docs: typedoc --out docs --name WebCenterJS --module commonjs --target ES5 --excludeExternals  --includeDeclarations --theme default --excludePrivate   ./lib/

author: Rakesh Gajula <rakesh.gajula@gmail.com>
